summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chi's Fixerupper handyman website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: Seed data endpoint - sample testimonials and gallery items
POST /api/contact - contact form submission with validation
Form validation - 422 error for invalid email format
Homepage loads with Hero section displaying Chi's info
Navigation links work (Services, Our Work, Reviews, Contact)
Services section displays all 11 service cards in bento grid layout
Gallery section with interactive before/after slider comparison
Testimonials section displays customer reviews with star ratings
Contact form submission with name, email, phone, message fields
Footer displays correctly with contact info and service links
Mobile responsiveness with working hamburger menu
Backend-frontend integration for contact form submission
Proper data-testid attributes for automated testing
